Name: Lessor must be landowner
Prompt Short: Lessor must be landowner or have right to rent

Name: PG NOTE
Prompt Short: If No Personal Guarantee (PG) Promissory Note it is a rule violation / poison pill. The Equity Placement Committee (EPC) is unable to provide sufficient funding, so the issue needs to be addressed through other means.
